entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who cannot come with the narrator to visit Phineas Nigellus's portrait.

entities.name: phineas nigellus
entities.description: Phineas Nigellus is a portrait of Professor Black, who is mentioned as being in the castle and trying to leave his frame.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as watching Phineas Nigellus try to leave his frame and reacting to Phineas's response about the sword of Gryffindor.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as asking Professor Black when the last time the sword was taken out of its case, and reacting to Phineas's response.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as taking the sword out of its case before Hermione asked about it.

entities.name: sword of gryffindor
entities.description: The sword of Gryffindor is mentioned as being taken out of its case by Dumbledore and Ginny, and as the subject of Hermione's question.

entities.name: ring
entities.description: A ring is mentioned as being broken open by Dumbledore using the sword of Gryffindor.

relationships.description: Dumbledore used the sword of Gryffindor to break open a ring.
Ginny took the sword out of its case before Hermione asked about it.
